abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission still faces major obstacles in its efforts to reorganize its enforcement division, The Washington Post reports.
snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission still faces major obstacles in its efforts to reorganize its enforcement division, The Washington Post reports.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission has sought to reorganize its enforcement division in the wake of its failure to halt Ponzi schemes like Bernard L. Madoff‘s. But it still faces some obstacles in its quest, The Washington Post reports.

headline.main: Hurdles Remain in S.E.C.’s Enforcement Overhaul

abstract: While its rivals have spent much of the past year regaining market share lost during the financial crisis, JPMorgan Chase sat atop Dealogic’s investment banking league tables for the first quarter of 2010. (It slipped in mergers advisory, however.)
snippet: While its rivals have spent much of the past year regaining market share lost during the financial crisis, JPMorgan Chase sat atop Dealogic’s investment banking league tables for the first quarter of 2010. (It slipped in mergers advisory, however....
lead_paragraph: While its rivals have spent much of the past year regaining market share lost during the financial crisis, JPMorgan Chase sat atop Dealogic’s investment banking league tables for the first quarter of 2010.

headline.main: JPMorgan Keeps Lead in I-Banking League Tables
